member.name: T:Auth0.Core.Addons
member.summary: Addons are extensions associated with an Application in Auth0. Usually, they are 3rd party APIs used by the app that Auth0 generates access tokens for (e.g. Salesforce, Azure Service Bus, Azure Mobile Services, SAP, etc).

member.summary: Represents a client (App) in Auth0

member.summary: The id of the client.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Client.SigningKeys
member.summary: Client signing keys.

member.summary: Represents a delegated refresh token.

member.summary: The refresh token.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.ClientBase
member.summary: Base class for clients.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.AddOns
member.summary: Gets or sets the addons which are associated with the client.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.AllowedClients
member.summary: Ids of clients that will be allowed to perform delegation requests. Clients that will be allowed to make delegation request.
member.remarks: By default, all your clients will be allowed. This field allows you to specify specific clients.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.AllowedOrigins
member.summary: A set of URLs that represents valid origins for CORS.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.Callbacks
member.summary: A set of URLs that are valid to call back from Auth0 when authenticating users.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.ClientAliases
member.summary: List of audiences for SAML protocol.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.ClientSecret
member.summary: The secret used to sign tokens for the client.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.IsCustomLoginPageOn
member.summary: True if the custom login page is to be used, false otherwise. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.CustomLoginPage
member.summary: The content (HTML, CSS, JS) of the custom login page.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.FormTemplate
member.summary: Form template for WS-Federation protocol.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.Name
member.summary: The name of the client. Must contain at least one character. Does not allow '<' or '>'.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ClientBase.Sso
member.summary: True to use Auth0 instead of the IdP to do Single Sign On, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Connection.Id
member.summary: The connection's identifier

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Connection.Strategy
member.summary: The type of the connection, related to the identity provider.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.ConnectionBase
member.summary: Base class for connections.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ConnectionBase.Name
member.summary: The name of the connection.
member.remarks: Must start with an alphanumeric characters and can only contain alphanumeric characters and '-'. Max length 35.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ConnectionBase.Options
member.summary: The options for the connection.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.ConnectionBase.EnabledClients
member.summary: The identifiers of the clients for which the connection is to be enabled. If the array is empty or the property is not specified, no clients are enabled.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.DailyStatistics
member.summary: vb

member.summary: The date to which the stats belong.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.DailyStatistics.Logins
member.summary: The amount of logins on the date.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.DailyStatistics.SignUps
member.summary: The amount of signups on the date.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.EmailProviderCredentials
member.summary: Credentials for an email provider.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.EmailProviderCredentials.ApiUser
member.summary: Gets or sets the API User.
member.remarks: Applicable only to the SendGrid provider.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.EmailProviderCredentials.AccessKeyId

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.EmailProviderCredentials.SecretAccessKey

member.remarks: Applicable only to the AWS provider.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.EmailProviderCredentials.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets the default AWS region.
member.remarks: Applicable only to the AWS provider.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.DeviceCredentialBase.Type

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.Identity
member.summary: Describes a 3rd party account for a given .
member.remarks: A single may be linked to multiple 3rd party accounts. This object defines the details of one of those accounts.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Identity.AccessToken
member.summary: The token that can be used to call the 's API to get more information about the user.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Identity.Connection
member.summary: The name of the connection for the identity.
member.remarks: Sometimes, this is the same as the connection, but not always.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Identity.IsSocial
member.summary: Indicates whether this is a social identity.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Identity.Provider
member.summary: The type of identity provider.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Identity.UserId
member.summary: The user's identifier.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.Job

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Job.Status
member.summary: The job's status.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Job.Type
member.summary: The type of job.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Job.Id
member.summary: The job's identifier. Useful to retrieve its status later on.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Job.Connection
member.summary: The connection identifier of the connection to which users will be inserted.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.TenantErrorPage.Html

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.Rule
member.summary: Represents a rule. A rule is arbitrary JavaScript code that can be used to extend Auth0's default behavior when authenticating a user.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rule.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier for the rule.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rule.Stage
member.summary: Gets or sets the execution stage of the rule.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.RuleBase
member.summary: Base class for rules.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.RuleBase.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the rule.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.RuleBase.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the rule is enabled.
member.remarks: True if the connection is enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.RuleBase.Script
member.summary: Gets or sets the code to be executed when the rule runs.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.RuleBase.Order
member.summary: Gets or sets the order of the rule in relation to other rules. A rule with a lower order than another rule executes first.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the user was created.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.Identities
member.summary: An array of objects with information about the user's identities. More than one will exists in case accounts are linked

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.Locale
member.remarks: Returned for the Facebook, Google, and Microsoft social providers.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.PhoneVerified
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the user's phone number is verified.
member.remarks:
True if the phone is verified, otherwise false.
This is only valid for users from SMS connections.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the user was last updated (modified).

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.UserId
member.summary: A unique identifier of the user per identity provider, same for all apps (e.g.: google-oauth2|103547991597142817347). ALWAYS GENERATED

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.Blocked
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the user is blocked. True if the user is blocked, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.ProviderAttributes
member.summary: Contains a lists of all the extra provider specific user attributes over and above those contained in the normalized user profile.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.User.Multifactor
member.summary: Multifactor settings.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.UserBase
member.summary: Contains common elements used for both constructing -related requests, and comprising -related responses.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.AppMetadata
member.summary: Contains user meta data. The user has read-only access to this.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's email address.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.EmailVerified
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the user's email address is verified.
member.remarks: True if the email address is verified, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's phone number.
member.remarks: This is only valid for users from SMS connections.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.UserMetadata
member.summary: Contains user meta data. The user has read/write access to this.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.UserName
member.summary: Gets or sets the user' username.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.NickName
member.summary: The Nickname of the user.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.FirstName
member.summary: The first name of the user (if available).
member.remarks: This is the given_name attribute supplied by the underlying API.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.FullName
member.summary: The full name of the user (e.g.: John Foo). ALWAYS GENERATED.
member.remarks: This is the name attribute supplied by the underlying API.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.LastName
member.summary: The last name of the user (if available).
member.remarks: This is the family_name attribute supplied by the underlying API.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.UserBase.Picture
member.summary: URL pointing to the user picture (if not available, will use gravatar.com with the email). ALWAYS GENERATED

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.EncryptionKey.PublicKey
member.summary: Encryption public key

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.EncryptionKey.Certificate
member.summary: Encryption certificate

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.JwtConfiguration.IsSecretEncoded
member.summary: True if the client secret is base64 encoded, false otherwise. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.JwtConfiguration.LifetimeInSeconds
member.summary: The amount of time (in seconds) that the token will be valid after being issued. (affects 'exp' claim)

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.JwtConfiguration.Scopes
member.summary: The scopes for the JWT.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.JwtConfiguration.SigningAlgorithm
member.summary: The algorithm used to sign the JsonWebToken. Possible values are 'HS256' or 'RS256'.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.Rules.LoginRequest
member.summary: Represents details of the Login request from the app to Auth0, including QueryString and User Location.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.LoginRequest.Body
member.summary: The body of the POST request on login transactions used on oauth2-resource-owner or wstrust-usernamemixed protocols.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.LoginRequest.IpAddress
member.summary: The originating IP address of the user trying to log in.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.LoginRequest.Query
member.summary: The QueryString of the login transaction sent by the application.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.LoginRequest.UserAgent
member.summary: The user-agent of the client that is trying to log in.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContext.ClientId
member.summary: The client id of the application the user is logging in to.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContext.Connection
member.summary: The name of the connection used to authenticate the user (e.g.: twitter or some-google-apps-domain)

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContext.ConnectionStrategy
member.summary: The type of connection.
member.remarks: For social connection connectionStrategy === connection. For enterprise connections, the strategy will be waad (Windows Azure AD), ad (Active Directory/LDAP), auth0 (database connections), etc.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContext.Protocol
member.summary: The authentication protocol.
member.remarks: Possible values: oidc-basic-profile (most used, web based login), oidc-implicit-profile (used on mobile devices and single page apps), oauth2-resource-owner (user/password login typically used on database connections), samlp (SAML protocol used on SaaS apps), wsfed (WS-Federation used on Microsoft products like Office365), wstrust-usernamemixed (WS-trust user/password login used on CRM and Office365), and delegation (when calling the Delegation endpoint).

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContext.LoginRequest
member.summary: An object containing useful information of the request.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContext.SamlConfiguration
member.summary: An object that controls the behavior of the SAML and WS-Fed endpoints. Useful for advanced claims mapping and token enrichment (only available for samlp and wsfed protocol).

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContext.Stats
member.summary: An object containing specific user stats, like stats.loginsCount.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContextStats
member.summary: An object containing specific user stats.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesContextStats.LoginCount
member.summary: The number of times the User has logged in.

member.name: T:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesRequest
member.summary: Represents the root object POSTed from the Rules Engine, if you follow the example.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesRequest.User
member.summary: The user object as it comes from the identity provider.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesRequest.Context
member.summary: An object containing contextual information of the current authentication transaction.

member.name: P:Auth0.Core.Rules.RulesRequest.SecretToken
member.summary: A random string you specify to make sure the request is coming from your Auth0 Rule.
